video_description: If you're after a small-screened tab, Huawei's Honeycomb-flavoured 7in MediaPad has the luxury tablet feel thanks to its aluminium unibody design and all the power of its bigger brothers. But is it worth the  £330 price tag? Remember, http://www.stuff.tv is the place to go for your daily gadget fix
title: Huawei MediaPad video review
